meanings: (사람을) meet, see; (처음으로) (formal) encounter; (우연히) come across, run[bump] into
약속 Can we make it some other time?
약속 Is it possible for us to meet later?
약속 Let's see each other later on.
입원에 관한 표현 It's no good if you get an unkind nurse.

vlive.korean: [고민(하는 척?) ] 애들 만나면 뭐 소고기나... [Pretending to be thinking?] When we meet...maybe beef? 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 2020 ASTRO Live on WWW.
vlive.english: [Pretending to be thinking?] When we meet...maybe beef?

vlive.korean: '민혁아 동갑 팬을 만나면 어떤 느낌이야?' "Minhyuk, how do you feel when you meet a fan the same age?" 듣기 View video ASTRO : 안 주무시면 컴온 ~ 🐮💩 방송
vlive.english: "Minhyuk, how do you feel when you meet a fan the same age?"

vlive.korean: 나 쟤 만나면 안 돼! I can't meet him now! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 요즘 너만 보면 자꾸 커진단 말이야 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP3
나중에 다시 만나면... - 확실히... If we meet again... - For sure... 듣기 View video ATEEZ : From 😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍
vlive.english: If we meet again... - For sure...

vlive.korean: 난 진짜 아저씨 다 된 것 같아, 옛날 얘기만 해 만나면! I feel like I've grown up. We only talk about old days when we meet! 듣기 View video BTS : 슙디의 꿀 FM 06.13 with RM #0613FM_0502
vlive.english: I feel like I've grown up. We only talk about old days when we meet!

examples.korean: Give my love to Mary when you see her. 발음듣기 메리 만나면 안부 전해 줘. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Give my love to Mary when you see her. 발음

examples.korean: If you see him, give him this note. 발음듣기 그를 만나면 이 쪽지 좀 전해 줘. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If you see him, give him this note. 발음

examples.korean: When they get together, all they talk about is football. 발음듣기 그들은 함께 만나면 온통 축구 얘기밖에 안 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When they get together, all they talk about is football. 발음

examples.korean: Give your brother my regards when you see him. 발음듣기 당신 오빠[형님/남동생] 만나면 제 안부 전해 주세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Give your brother my regards when you see him. 발음

examples.korean: Just think how nice it would be to see them again. 발음듣기 그들을 다시 만나면 얼마나 좋을지 한번 생각해 봐. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Just think how nice it would be to see them again. 발음
